author: IGN
title: The Spider-Man: No Way Home script was changed when the director saw a piece of fan art on reddit!

author: IGN
description: Take a look at gameplay and more from Holdfast: Nations At War in this trailer for the multiplayer first and third-person shooter set during the great Napoleonic Era and WW1. Fight on multiple fronts and charge into battle when Holdfast: Nations At War launches on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S on July 9, 2025. Holdfast: Nations At War is available now on PC.
title: Holdfast: Nations At War - Official Console Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Reveal Trailer for Demiurgos, an upcoming strategic god simulation game developed by Tlon Industries. Players will make use of the powers of the divine to influence the masses in a positive or negative manner as they deem fit. Create a religion, command priests, and lead the people to eternal life or chaos. Demiurgos is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Demiurgos - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Sins of the Horadrim Update Overview Video for Diablo 4, the hit action RPG developed by Blizzard Entertainment. Join key developers on the Diablo 4 team on the new additions with the upcoming Sins of the Horadrim update, including specific Horadric Strongrooms, Escalating Nightmares, Customizable Spells, and Horadric Jewels. The update is also fitted with a plethora of quality-of-life improvements coming with the Sins of the Horadrim Update for Diablo 4, launching on July 1 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One. Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Battlenet).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Diablo 4 - Official Sins of the Horadrim Update Overview

author: IGN
description:
In celebration of Mecha BREAK's 1.0 release, IGN's Nick Limon is suiting up and jumping into some online matchmaking checking out Mecha BREAK's 6v6 objective-based mode, Operation Verge and Mecha BREAK's 3v3 Team Deathmatch-inspired mode, Ace Arena. Along the way he'll be checking out different Strikers Mecha BREAK has available at launch.

Mecha BREAK is available now on Xbox Series X|S and Steam.

Presented by Amazing Seasun Games.
title: Mecha BREAK Matchmaking: Operation Verge and Ace Arena Gameplay Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Join us live for NARAKA: BLADEPOINT 4th Anniversary stream featuring brand-new gameplay mode - Rift Traversal, and the debut of our new hero —Inor Wan!

Log in Naraka after the update on July 8 PT to claim EXTREME weapon skin and explore all the limited-time anniversary awards. Don't miss the action, surprises, and exclusive content we've prepared for our forerunners.

Presented by @NARAKABLADEPOINT
title: NARAKA FEST Direct 2025 | New Extraction Mode: Rift Traversal Coming Soon

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Gameplay First Look Video for College Football 26, the latest addition to the college football simulation game developed by EA Sports. Players can join a selection of developers, players, and coaches to see over 15 minutes of College Football 26 gameplay. Fans can get a good sense at the moment-to-moment gameplay with a look at the new plays, players, upgraded abilities, and more. College Football 26 is launching on July 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S.
title: College Football 26 - Official Gameplay First Look

description:

title: Get to know the PC building experts of @TechTesseract  Presented by @Intel

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Now in Production' Teaser for The Devil Wears Prada 2, a sequel to the classic comedy drama film distributed by 20th Century Studios. Hear voice-overs from the star-studded cast as the film announces its production of The Devil Wears Prada 2, releasing in 2026.

The Devil Wears Prada 2 follows Miranda Priestly's struggle against Emily Charlton, her former assistant turned rival executive, as they compete for advertising revenue amidst declining print media while Miranda nears retirement.

The Devil Wears Prada 2 stars Anne Hathaway, Meryl Streep, Emily Blunt, Stanley Tucci, and more. The film is directed by David Frankel and written by Aline Brosh McKenna.

The Devil Wears Prada 2 is releasing in 2026.
title: The Devil Wears Prada 2 - Official 'Now in Production' Teaser (2026) Anne Hathaway, Meryl Streep

author: IGN
description:
Meet the cast of Smurfs in this behind-the-scenes video for the upcoming movie starring Rihanna, James Corden, Nick Offerman, JP Karliak, Daniel Levy, Amy Sedaris, Natasha Lyonne, Sandra Oh, Jimmy Kimmel, Octavia Spencer, Nick Kroll, Hannah Waddingham, Alex Winter, Maya Erskine, Billie Lourd, Xolo Maridueña, Marshmello, with Kurt Russell and John Goodman.

When Papa Smurf (John Goodman) is mysteriously taken by evil wizards, Razamel and Gargamel, Smurfette (Rihanna) leads the Smurfs on a mission into the real world to save him. With the help of new friends, the Smurfs must discover what defines their destiny to save the universe.

Smurfs is based on the characters and works of Peyo. The film is produced by Jay Brown, Ty Ty Smith, Robyn Rihanna Fenty, Ryan Harris, p.g.a. Executive producers are Pete Chiappetta, Anthony Tittanegro, and Andrew Lary. It is written by Pam Brady.

Smurfs, directed by Chris Miller, opens in theaters on July 18, 2025.

#Smurfs #Rihanna #Movies
title: Smurfs - Official 'It Takes a Village' Behind-the-Scenes Video (2025) Rihanna, James Corden

author: IGN
description:
Get to know the Drakong InfinaKore, a new guitar peripheral for rhythm games like Fortnite Festival, Guitar Hero, Rock Band, Clone Hero, and YARG. In this developer overview, Hyperkin CTO Slade Suzuki and Product Manager Nathan Perez talk through the InfinaKore's key features, including its iconic Fender Telecaster design. The guitar is also fully modular, allowing players to customize their ax by swapping out parts or even 3D-printing their own. 

The InfinaKore will be available in two versions, an Xbox Edition that's officially licensed for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC, handheld PCs, smartphones, smart TVs, and more, and a Multi-Platform Edition that's compatible with Nintendo Switch®, PlayStation®, PC, handheld PCs, smartphones, smart TVs, and more.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Drakong InfinaKore Telecaster Edition – Developer Overview

author: IGN
description:
The franchise 65 million years in the making is back! Scarlett Johansson and Mahershala Ali lead a new cast on a new adventure in Jurassic World Rebirth. But can a movie hinting at a fresh start right there in its title deliver on that promise? Gareth Edwards brings his signature flare for terrifying scale from Godzilla and Rogue One into Jurassic Park, trying to keep this new direction for the franchise from being just another Lost World.

#IGN  #IGN Movies  #JurassicWorldRebirth
title: Jurassic World Rebirth Review

author: IGN
description:
Get a closer look at the story you'll play through in this new trailer for Ecumene Aztec, the upcoming third-person survival action-RPG Ecumene Aztec where you play as an Aztec trying to withstand the assault of Spanish conquistadors in your Mesoamerican city. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2383240/Ecumene_Aztec/

#IGN
title: Ecumene Aztec - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
L.A.-based gaming hardware company Drakong™ is proud to unveil a groundbreaking partnership with Fender®, the world’s leading guitar manufacturer, to launch a new line of premium guitar peripherals for rhythm game enthusiasts. Leading the charge is the InfinaKore “Telecaster® Edition”. A revolutionary modular guitar controller that quite literally breaks the mold.



Key Features of the InfinaKore “Telecaster® Edition”:

· Fully Modular Design – Customizable components including body, fret buttons, tuner head, whammy bar, and strum bar. 3D print files will be made available to the public.

· Accessibility-First – The world’s first rhythm game guitar designed with accessibility in mind. Open-source mods will be provided to empower players of all abilities.

· New Gameplay Mechanic – Introducing the Fret-Tapping D-Pad, a brand-new control system that challenges both players of old and new.

· Versatile Connectivity – Wired, 2.4GHz wireless, and Bluetooth support. (Platform compatibility
title: Drakong InfinaKore Telecaster Edition – Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Weapons Docket Trailer for Dying Light: The Beast, the next installment in the first-person zombie parkour action shooter series developed by Techland. Players will have the ability to redeem Weapon Dockets in-game, special codes that can be redeemed to add new weapons, outfits, or other items to the in-game stash. Get the rundown with the latest trailer for Dying Light: The Beast, launching on August 22 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#DyingLightTheBeast #Gaming #IGN
title: Dying Light: The Beast - Official Weapons Docket Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the June 2025 Fortnite Crew Trailer for Fortnite, the hit battle royale developed by Epic Games. Players can access a suite of new content included in the Fortnite Crew subscription, that now is fitted with every single Pass, every single time. This month gives players hit skins like Bruno Mars, Superman, The Visitor, and more. Subscribe to Fortnite Crew today for Fortnite.

#Fortnite #Gaming #IGN
title: Fortnite - Official June 2025 Fortnite Crew Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Console Release Date Trailer for Delta Force, the hit free-to-play action first-person multiplayer action shooter developed by Team Jade. Players will take to the battlefield across multiple regions with differing modes to engage with in all-out war. The upcoming console version is packed with cross-progression and cross-play across mobile and PC. The fight takes on a new front with the console release slated for August 19 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S.

#DeltaForce #Gaming #IGN
title: Delta Force - Official Console Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Photo Mode Trailer for Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, the latest action-adventure Strand game developed by Kojima Productions. Players can capture the scenic views and landscapes of Mexico, Australia, and more as the journey continues with Sam Porter Bridges. Take a look at the latest trailer to see the enhancements and new additions to the game's Photo Mode for Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#DeathStranding2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach - Official Photo Mode Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Turtlemania is back! Experience one of the biggest and most widely anticipated movie anniversary celebrations of the year with Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary coming to theatres from Fathom Entertainment, the leading specialty distributor of content to theatrical partners worldwide, Saga Arts, and Warner Bros. Motion Picture Group on August 17 and 20.

Legions of fans of the superhero movie and new audiences will delight in the shared theatrical experience of the iconic “Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles” comic book adaptation starring "Leonardo", "Michelangelo", "Donatello", and "Raphael" that caused a pop culture craze upon its 1990 premiere, and now offers longtime fans the chance to introduce their kids to the original movie that started it all, back on the big screen.

From New Line Cinema and directed by the legendary film and music video director Steve Barron, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary will also present the Turtles Unmasked featurette. Produced in c
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary Re-Release - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
11.9 Light-years from home. 6th grade science teacher. 1 chance to save us all. Check out the Project Hail Mary trailer for the upcoming movie based on Andy Weir's New York Times best-selling novel. Project Hail Mary stars Ryan Gosling. Project Hail Mary, directed by Phil Lord and Christopher Miller, opens in theaters and IMAX on March 20, 2026.

#ProjectHailMary #RyanGosling #Movies
title: Project Hail Mary - Official Trailer (2025) Ryan Gosling, Liz Kingsman, James Ortiz

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Collector's Edition Trailer for Ghost of Yotei, the next third-person action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions. Players can get the rundown on what's included with the Collector's Edition of the game with a replica Ghost Mask, a Sash modeled off the in-game variant, Art Cards, and more for fans to enjoy. Ghost of Yotei launches on October 2 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#GhostOfYotei #Gaming #IGN
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official Collector's Edition Trailer
